name: SinkSpec
description:
SinkSpec configures where output is written. Exactly one field should be set.
If none is set, defaults based on mode: stdout for stream, filesystem for files.

fields.name: Filesystem
fields.description: Filesystem writes to files on the local filesystem.

fields.name: S3
fields.description: S3 writes to S3-compatible object storage (AWS S3, Cloudflare R2, MinIO).
